summary.span: 封装一个 GDI+ 绘图图面。

span.span: Encapsulates a GDI+ drawing surface.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了对象绘制到显示设备的方法。The class provides methods for drawing objects to the display device. 一个与特定设备上下文相关联。A is associated with a specific device context. 你可以获取对象通过调用继承的对象上的方法，或通过处理控件的事件和访问属性类。You can obtain a object by calling the method on an object that inherits from , or by handling a control's event and accessing the property of the class. 此外可以创建对象使用的映像从方法。You can also create a object from an image by using the method. 有关创建的详细信息对象，请参阅[如何： 创建用于绘制的图形对象](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-create-graphics-objects-for-drawing.md)。For more information about creating a object, see [How to: Create Graphics Objects for Drawing](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-create-graphics-objects-for-drawing.md). 可以通过绘制多个不同的形状和线条对象。You can draw many different shapes and lines by using a object. 有关如何绘制线条和形状的详细信息，请参阅特定于`Draw` *GraphicalElement*方法的行或你想要绘制的形状。For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see the specific `Draw`*GraphicalElement* method for the line or shape you want to draw. 这些方法包括， ， ， ，和。These methods include , , , , and . 有关如何绘制线条和形状的详细信息，请参阅[用笔和绘制线条和形状](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-pen-to-draw-lines-and-shapes.md)并[使用画笔填充形状到](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-brush-to-fill-shapes.md)。For more information about how to draw lines and shapes, see [Using a Pen to Draw Lines and Shapes](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-pen-to-draw-lines-and-shapes.md) and [Using a Brush to Fill Shapes](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/using-a-brush-to-fill-shapes.md). 您还可以通过绘制图像和图标和方法，分别。You can also draw images and icons by using the and methods, respectively. 执行颜色数据位块传输从屏幕到绘图图面的对象，请参阅。To perform a bit-block transfer of color data from the screen to the drawing surface of the object, see . 有关如何绘制图像的详细信息对象，请参阅[使用图像、 位图、 图标和图元文件](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md)。For more information about how to draw images with a object, see [Working with Images, Bitmaps, Icons, and Metafiles](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/working-with-images-bitmaps-icons-and-metafiles.md). 此外，你能够使用的坐标系统对象。In addition, you can manipulate the coordinate system used by the object. 坐标系统以及如何对其进行操作的详细信息，请参阅[坐标系和坐标转换](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/coordinate-systems-and-transformations.md)。For more information on the coordinate system and how to manipulate it, see [Coordinate Systems and Transformations](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/coordinate-systems-and-transformations.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并需要对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms and requires a object. 对象被命名为`e`和参数的事件处理程序。The object is named `e` and is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 从 JPEG 文件创建映像。Creates an image from a JPEG file. 该文件命名为 sampimag.jpg 位于同和位于该示例的文件夹中。The file is named SampImag.jpg and is located in the folder of the example. - 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 通过将不成比例的图像绘制到屏幕对象。Draws the unscaled image to the screen by using a object. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#40)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是仅当此有效与关联。This method is valid only if this is associated with a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序，以及`thisForm`，则的示例。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler, as well as `thisForm`, the for the example. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个临时用于创建的图元文件和获取`hdc`，其设备上下文的句柄。Creates a temporary for creating the metafile and gets an `hdc`, a handle to its device context. - 创建一个新的图元文件使用`hdc`。Creates a new metafile using the `hdc`. - 创建以显示图元文件从。Creates a for display of the metafile from the . - 向图元文件绘制一个矩形。Draws a rectangle to the metafile. - 将注释添加到图元文件。Adds a comment to the metafile. - 释放的图元文件对象关闭图元文件。Disposes the for the metafile-which closes the metafile. - 释放图元文件。Disposes the metafile. - 释放该临时`hdc`。Releases the temporary `hdc`. - 释放该临时。Disposes the temporary . - 从以前创建的文件创建第二个图元文件。Creates a second metafile from the previously created file. - 将图元文件绘制到屏幕。Draws the metafile to the screen. - 释放图元文件。Disposes the metafile. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 保存具有此 的当前状态的图形容器，然后打开并使用新的图形容器。

span.span: Saves a graphics container with the current state of this and opens and uses a new graphics container.

returns.span: 此方法返回一个 ，该对象表示该方法调用运行时此 的状态。

span.span: This method returns a that represents the state of this at the time of the method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此方法用于方法来创建嵌套的图形容器。Use this method with the method to create nested graphics containers. 图形容器保留的图形状态，例如转换、 剪辑区域和呈现属性。Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties. 当您调用方法，保存的状态信息块放在堆栈上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法将返回，用于标识该信息块。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 当您标识将对象传递给方法，该信息块从堆栈中移除并用于还原时的状态为方法调用。When you pass the identifying object to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 可以嵌套容器;也就是说，可以调用方法在调用之前几次方法。Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次调用方法中，信息块放置在堆栈上，并且您收到信息块。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 当传递到这些对象之一方法，返回到它所处的时间的状态方法调用返回了该特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 信息块放置在堆栈上的方法调用将从堆栈中，删除，所有信息块后，都放置在该堆栈上方法调用也将被删除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 调用方法相同调用堆栈上的位置信息块方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像方法调用搭配方法调用方法调用搭配方法调用。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同样，当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 图形状态由方法包括默认图形状态的呈现质量; 任何呈现质量状态更改时调用的方法的现有重置为默认值。The graphics state established by the method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 打开新的图形容器，并保存旧的容器。Opens a new graphics container and saves the old container. - 将转换的世界坐标以容器。Translates the world coordinates in the container. - 填入一个红色矩形 (转换的坐标) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (translated coordinates of the) new container. - 关闭新的容器并将还原已保存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填充已保存容器的绿色矩形 （为未转换的坐标中）。Fills a green rectangle (to the untranslated coordinates) of the saved container. 结果是覆盖相同大小的红色矩形之上的绿色矩形。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a red rectangle of the same size. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次调用方法中，信息块放置在堆栈上，并且您收到信息块。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 当传递到这些对象之一方法，返回到它所处的时间的状态方法调用返回了该特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 信息块放置在堆栈上的方法调用将从堆栈中，删除，所有信息块后，都放置在该堆栈上方法调用也将被删除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 调用方法相同调用堆栈上的位置信息块方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像方法调用搭配方法调用方法调用搭配方法调用。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过`Save`方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the `Save` method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同样，当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 此方法指定缩放变换为与新的图形容器`dstrect`和`srcrect`参数。This method specifies a scale transformation for the new graphics container with the `dstrect` and `srcrect` parameters. 小数位数等于转换，当应用于`srcrect`，会导致`dstrect`。The scale is equal to the transformation that, when applied to `srcrect`, results in `dstrect`. 图形状态由方法包括默认图形状态的呈现质量; 任何呈现质量状态更改时调用的方法的现有重置为默认值。The graphics state established by the method includes the rendering qualities of the default graphics state; any rendering-quality state changes existing when the method is called are reset to the default values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建两个矩形指定缩放变换为新的容器。Creates two rectangles to specify a scale transformation for the new container. - 打开新的图形容器，并保存旧的容器。Opens the new graphics container and saves the old container. - 填入一个红色矩形 (缩放的坐标) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (scaled coordinates of the) new container. - 关闭新的容器并将还原已保存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填充已保存容器的绿色矩形 （为不成比例的坐标中）。Fills a green rectangle (to the unscaled coordinates) of the saved container. 结果是覆盖较小的红色矩形之上的绿色矩形。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a smaller red rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除图形对象的状态并不能更新图形对象时不应调用。The method clears the state of the graphics object and should not be called when the graphics object cannot be updated. 例如，如果在终端服务器会话中，在安全桌面上上调用方法可能会发生，离开处于不一致状态的对象。For example, if the method is called on a secure desktop in a terminal server session, an may occur, leaving the object in an inconsistent state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 则代码将清除绘图图面的将背景颜色设置为系统定义的青色。The code clears the drawing surface of the and sets the background color to the system-defined teal color. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所得矩形的大小的单位由属性。The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the property. 默认单位为像素。The default unit is pixels. 一个通常与控件相关联，该矩形的原点将相对于该控件的客户端区域。A is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control. 如果的剪辑区域为无限，属性将返回无意义的大矩形。If the clipping region is infinite, the property returns a meaningless large rectangle. 若要确定的剪辑区域是否为无限，检索属性并调用其方法。To determine whether the clipping region is infinite, retrieve the property and call its method.

span.span: Draws an arc representing a portion of an ellipse specified by a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制一段弧线的椭圆的外围网络的一部分。This method draws an arc that is a portion of the perimeter of an ellipse. 该椭圆的矩形的边界定义。The ellipse is defined by the boundaries of a rectangle. 弧线是外围网络之间的椭圆的一部分`startAngle`参数和`startAngle` + `sweepAngle`参数。The arc is the portion of the perimeter of the ellipse between the `startAngle` parameter and the `startAngle` + `sweepAngle` parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建黑色的笔。Creates a black pen. - 创建要绑定一个椭圆的矩形。Creates a rectangle to bound an ellipse. - 定义开始 （45 度为单位） 和扫描 （270 度为单位） 的角度。Defines the start (45 degrees) and sweep (270 degrees) angles. - 在屏幕上绘制椭圆弧。Draws the elliptical arc to the screen. 结果是部分椭圆，缺少之间的线段 + 和-x 轴的 45 度。The result is a partial ellipse missing a segment between + and - 45 degrees of the x axis. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从第一个点到第四个点绘制贝塞尔曲线。The Bézier curve is drawn from the first point to the fourth point. 第二个和第三个点是确定曲线的形状的控制点。The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建黑色的笔。Creates a black pen. - 创建开始时间、 结束时和曲线的两个控制点。Creates the start, end, and two control points for the curve. - 在屏幕上绘制贝塞尔曲线。Draws the Bézier curve to the screen. span.span: Draws a Bézier spline defined by four ordered pairs of coordinates that represent points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从第一个点到第四个点绘制贝塞尔样条。The Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point. 第二个和第三个点是确定曲线的形状的控制点。The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建黑色的笔。Creates a black pen. - 创建的开始、 结束时间和曲线的两个控点的坐标。Creates the coordinates of the start, end, and two control points for the curve. - 在屏幕上绘制贝塞尔曲线。Draws the Bézier curve to the screen. param.name: pen
param.span: ，它确定曲线的颜色、宽度和样式。

span.span: that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.

param.name: points
param.span: 结构的数组，这些结构表示确定曲线的点。

span.span: Array of structures that represent the points that determine the curve.

param.span: 此数组中的点数应为 3 的倍数加 1，如 4、7 或 10。

span.span: The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1, such as 4, 7, or 10.

summary.span: 用 结构数组绘制一系列贝塞尔样条。

span.span: Draws a series of Bézier splines from an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的点数应为 3 的倍数加 1，因为第一个自由绘制曲线需要 4 个点，并且其他自由绘制曲线需要 3 个点。The number of points in the array should be a multiple of 3 plus 1 because the first spline requires 4 points and any other splines require 3 points each. 第一个贝塞尔样条是从第一个点到点数组中的第四个点绘制的。The first Bézier spline is drawn from the first point to the fourth point in the point array. 第二个和第三个点是确定曲线的形状的控制点。The second and third points are control points that determine the shape of the curve. 每个后续的曲线需要完全三个点： 两个控制点和结束点。Each subsequent curve needs exactly three more points: two more control points and an ending point. 前一条曲线的结束点用作一条曲线的起始点。The ending point of the previous curve is used as the starting point for each additional curve. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建黑色的笔。Creates a black pen. - 创建开始时间、 结束时，和两个控制点第一条曲线和终结点和第二条曲线的两个控制点。Creates the start, end, and two control points for a first curve and endpoint and two control points for a second curve. - 在屏幕上绘制连续的贝塞尔曲线。Draws the successive Bézier curves to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#14)]

param.name: pen
param.span: ，它确定曲线的颜色、宽度和高度。

span.span: that determines the color, width, and height of the curve.

param.name: points
param.span: 结构数组，这些结构定义样条。

span.span: Array of structures that define the spline.

summary.span: 绘制由 结构的数组定义的闭合基数样条。

span.span: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条。This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，附加曲线段是在最后一个点添加到的第一个点，以关闭该图中。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the figure. 点的数组必须包含至少四个结构。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 此方法使用默认张力 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建红色和绿色的笔。Creates red and green pens. - 创建七个点来定义一条曲线。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 七个点来形成闭合的多边形之间绘制七个红色的直线。Draws seven red straight lines between the seven points to form a closed polygon. - 绘制通过七个点的绿色闭合的曲线。Draws a green closed curve through the seven points. 该方法使用默认张力 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#16)]

span.span: Draws a closed cardinal spline defined by an array of structures using a specified tension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制经过数组中每个点的闭合基数样条。This method draws a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，附加曲线段在最后一个点添加到第一个点，以将其关闭。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 点的数组必须包含至少四个结构。The array of points must contain at least four structures. `tension`参数确定的自由绘制曲线形状。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果的值`tension`参数为 0.0F 时，此方法绘制直线段连接的点。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常情况下，`tension`参数小于或等于 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 超过 1.0 f 的值将产生不正常的结果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建红色和绿色的笔。Creates red and green pens. - 创建七个点来定义曲线。Creates seven points to define the curve. - 以形成一个多边形的七个点之间绘制七个红色的直线。Draws seven red straight lines between the seven points to form a polygon. - 创建张力和填充模式设置。Creates tension and fill mode settings. - 绘制通过七个点的绿色闭合的曲线。Draws a green closed curve through the seven points. 该方法使用 1.0 张力和填充模式设置为`FillMode.Alternate`。The method uses a tension of 1.0 and sets the fill mode to `FillMode.Alternate`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制经过数组中每个点的基数样条。This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 点的数组必须包含至少三个曲线要绘制的结构。The array of points must contain at least three structures for a curve to be drawn. 此方法使用默认张力 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建红色和绿色的笔。Creates red and green pens. - 创建七个点来定义一条曲线。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 以形成一个不完整的多边形的七个点之间绘制六个红色的直线。Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon. - 绘制通过七个点打开绿色曲线。Draws an open green curve through the seven points. 该方法使用默认张力 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. param.name: pen
param.span: ，它确定曲线的颜色、宽度和样式。

span.span: that determines the color, width, and style of the curve.

param.name: points
param.span: 结构数组，这些结构定义样条。

span.span: Array of structures that define the spline.

param.name: tension
param.span: 大于或等于 0.0F 的值，该值指定曲线的张力。

span.span: Value greater than or equal to 0.0F that specifies the tension of the curve.

summary.span: 使用指定的张力绘制经过一组指定的 结构的基数样条。

span.span: Draws a cardinal spline through a specified array of structures using a specified tension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制经过数组中每个点的基数样条。This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 点的数组必须包含至少三个曲线要绘制的结构。The array of points must contain at least three structures for a curve to be drawn. `tension`参数确定的自由绘制曲线形状。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果的值`tension`参数为 0.0F 时，此方法绘制直线段连接的点。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常情况下，`tension`参数小于或等于 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 超过 1.0 f 的值将产生不正常的结果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建红色和绿色的笔。Creates red and green pens. - 创建七个点来定义曲线。Creates seven points to define the curve. - 以形成一个不完整的多边形的七个点之间绘制六个红色的直线。Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon. - 创建张力设置。Creates a tension setting. - 绘制通过七个点打开绿色闭合的曲线。Draws an open green closed curve through the seven points. 该方法使用 1.0 的张力。The method uses a tension of 1.0. param.name: offset
param.span: 从 points 参数数组中的第一个元素到曲线中起始点的偏移量。

span.span: Draws a cardinal spline through a specified array of structures.

summary.span: 从相对于数组开始位置的偏移量开始绘制。

span.span: The drawing begins offset from the beginning of the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制经过数组中每个点的基数样条。This method draws a cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 点的数组必须包含至少三个曲线要绘制的结构。The array of points must contain at least three structures for a curve to be drawn. 值`offset`参数指定要跳过数组中的元素数。The value of the `offset` parameter specifies the number of elements to skip in the array. 已跳过的元素之后的第一个元素表示曲线的起始点。The first element after the skipped elements represents the starting point of the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`参数指定的段数之后以绘制曲线中起始点。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter specifies the number of segments, after the starting point, to draw in the curve. 值`numberOfSegments`参数必须是至少为 1。The value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be at least 1. 值`offset`参数和值`numberOfSegments`参数必须是中的数组的元素数小于`points`参数。The value of the `offset` parameter plus the value of the `numberOfSegments` parameter must be less than the number of elements in the array of the `points` parameter. 此方法使用默认张力 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建红色和绿色的笔。Creates red and green pens. - 创建七个点来定义一条曲线。Creates seven points to define a curve. - 以形成一个不完整的多边形的七个点之间绘制六个红色的直线。Draws six red straight lines between the seven points to form an incomplete polygon. - 定义的起始点偏移量和的段数。Defines the starting point offset and number of segments. - 绘制一打开绿色条曲线 （从第三个点） 通过最后五个点。Draws an open green curve (starting at the third point) through the last five points. 该方法使用默认张力 0.5。The method uses a default tension of 0.5. remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储像素宽度值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的单位是图像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 例如，使用像素宽度为 216 和 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率的图像具有物理 3 英寸的宽度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 说明同样适用于像素高度和物理的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 此方法绘制图像使用的物理大小，因此该图像将出现正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假设图像具有像素宽度为 216 和 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果调用此方法以绘制该图像的分辨率为 96 点 / 英寸的设备上，呈现的图像的像素宽度将是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 条。If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 将不成比例的图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the unscaled image to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#34](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#34)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#34)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#34)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 表示的图像`image`缩放和剪切以适合指定的平行四边形的形状参数`destPoints`参数。The image represented by the `image` parameter is scaled and sheared to fit the shape of the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建定义要在其中绘制图像的一个平行四边形的点。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 将图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the image to the screen. 平行四边形的位置确定图像在屏幕上，而原始映像和大小的大小和形状平行四边形的确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像。The position of the parallelogram locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储像素宽度值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的单位是图像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 例如，使用像素宽度为 216 和 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率的图像具有物理 3 英寸的宽度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 说明同样适用于像素高度和物理的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 此方法绘制图像使用的物理大小，因此该图像将出现正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。This method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假设图像具有像素宽度为 216 和 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果调用此方法以绘制该图像的分辨率为 96 点 / 英寸的设备上，呈现的图像的像素宽度将是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 条。If you call this method to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 将不成比例的图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the unscaled image to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 表示的图像`image`缩放和剪切以适合指定的平行四边形的形状对象`destPoints`参数。The image represented by the `image` object is scaled and sheared to fit the shape of the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建定义要在其中绘制图像的一个平行四边形的点。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 将图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the image to the screen. 平行四边形的位置确定图像在屏幕上，而原始映像和大小的大小和形状平行四边形的确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像。The position of the parallelogram locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`参数指定一个矩形部分的`image`对象来绘制。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 此部分进行缩放和剪切，以适合由指定的平行四边形`destPoints`参数。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建定义要绘制图像在其中一个目标平行四边形的点。Creates points that define a destination parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 创建要从中提取图像的一部分的源矩形。Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 设置源矩形的度量单位为像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 将图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the image to the screen. 目标的平行四边形的位置确定图像在屏幕上，源矩形和大小的大小和形状目标平行四边形确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像的并确定矩形的大小原始图像的哪个部分绘制到屏幕。The position of the destination parallelogram locates the image on the screen, the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image, and the size of the rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`参数指定一个矩形部分的`image`对象来绘制。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the`image` object to draw. 此部分进行缩放和剪切，以适合由指定的平行四边形`destPoints`参数。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建定义要在其中绘制图像的一个平行四边形的点。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 创建一个矩形来选择要绘制的图像的一部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 设置图形绘制像素为单位。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加平行四边形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 创建并设置调整后的映像，以便具有比平常的伽玛值的属性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 对于原始、 未调整平行四边形中，该位置确定图像在屏幕上，并矩形和大小的大小和形状平行四边形的确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像。For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#37](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#37)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#37](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#37)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#37](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#37)]

创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建定义要绘制图像在其中一个目标平行四边形的点。Creates points that define a destination parallelogram in which to draw the image. - remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储像素宽度值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的单位是图像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 例如，像素宽度为 360、 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率的图像具有物理宽度为 5 英寸。For example, an image with a pixel width of 360 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 5 inches. 说明同样适用于像素高度和物理的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 此方法绘制图像使用的物理大小，因此图像部分将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的一部分。This method draws a portion of an image using its physical size, so the image portion will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假设绘制图像部分的像素宽度为 216 和 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率。For example, suppose an image portion has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果调用此方法以每英寸 96 点的分辨率的设备上绘制该图像部分，呈现的图像部分的像素宽度将是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 条。If you call this method to draw that image portion on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image portion will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的坐标。Creates the coordinates at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 创建要从中提取图像的一部分的源矩形。Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 设置源矩形的度量单位为像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 将图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the image to the screen. 源矩形的大小确定不成比例的原始图像的哪个部分绘制到屏幕。The size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the unscaled original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#59](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#59)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#59](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#59)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#59](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#59)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义的矩形`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`参数确定的位置和所绘制图像的大小。The rectangle defined by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters determines the position and size of the drawn image. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建位置和在其中绘制图像的矩形的大小。Creates the position and size of a rectangle in which to draw the image. - 将图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the image to the screen. 矩形的位置确定图像在屏幕上，而原始图像的大小和矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放。The position of the rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the size of the original image and the size of the rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image. summary.span: 在指定的位置绘制图像的一部分。

span.span: Draws a portion of an image at a specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储像素宽度值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的单位是图像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 例如，像素宽度为 360、 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率的图像具有物理宽度为 5 英寸。For example, an image with a pixel width of 360 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 5 inches. 说明同样适用于像素高度和物理的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 此方法绘制图像使用的物理大小，因此图像部分将具有其正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的一部分。This method draws a portion of an image using its physical size, so the image portion will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假设绘制图像部分的像素宽度为 216 和 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率。For example, suppose an image portion has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果调用此方法以每英寸 96 点的分辨率的设备上绘制该图像部分，呈现的图像部分的像素宽度将是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 条。If you call this method to draw that image portion on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image portion will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的坐标。Creates the coordinates at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 创建要从中提取图像的一部分的源矩形。Creates a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 设置源矩形的度量单位为像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 将图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the image to the screen. 源矩形的大小确定不成比例的原始图像的哪个部分绘制到屏幕。The size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the unscaled original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#62](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#62)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#62](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#62)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#62](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#62)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: image
param.span: 要绘制的 。

span.span: to draw.

param.name: destPoints
param.span: 由三个 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个平行四边形。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram.

param.name: srcRect
param.span: 结构，它指定 image 对象中要绘制的部分。

span.span: structure that specifies the portion of the image object to draw.

param.name: srcUnit
param.span: 枚举的成员，它指定 srcRect 参数所用的度量单位。

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies the units of measure used by the srcRect parameter.

param.name: imageAttr
param.span: ，它指定 image 对象的重新着色和伽玛信息。

span.span: that specifies recoloring and gamma information for the image object.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委托，它指定在绘制图像期间要调用的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies a method to call during the drawing of the image.

param.span: 此方法被频繁调用以检查是否根据应用程序确定的条件停止 方法的执行。

span.span: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the method according to application-determined criteria.

summary.span: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 的指定部分。

span.span: Draws the specified portion of the specified at the specified location and with the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`参数指定一个矩形部分的`image`对象来绘制。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 此部分进行缩放和剪切，以适合由指定的平行四边形`destPoints`参数。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. 使用此重载`callback`参数提供了根据条件由应用程序启动后停止的图像的绘制的方法。This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application. 例如，应用程序可能开始绘制一个大图像，用户可能会滚动屏幕上，用例应用程序可以在其中停止绘制图像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 代码首先定义回调方法，以委托; 定义是过于简单，只是测试以了解是否方法调用它为 null`callBackData`参数。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 该示例的主要部分执行以下操作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 创建的实例回调方法：Creates an instance of the callback method: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建定义要在其中绘制图像的一个平行四边形的点。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 创建一个矩形来选择要绘制的图像的一部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 设置图形绘制像素为单位。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加平行四边形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 创建并设置调整后的映像，以便具有比平常的伽玛值的属性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 对于原始、 未调整平行四边形中，该位置确定图像在屏幕上，并矩形和大小的大小和形状平行四边形的确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像。For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. 因为此示例使用未通过的重载`callBackData`参数，回调返回`true`，这将导致结束，并在示例中包含的异常处理代码的方法将输出异常文本而不是绘制图像。Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `true`, which causes the method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#38)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#38)]

param.span: 此方法被频繁调用以检查是否根据应用程序确定的条件停止 方法的执行。

span.span: This method is called frequently to check whether to stop execution of the method according to application-determined criteria.

param.name: callbackData
param.span: 一个值，它为 委托指定在检查是否停止执行 方法时要使用的附加数据。

span.span: Value specifying additional data for the delegate to use when checking whether to stop execution of the method.

summary.span: 在指定位置并且按指定大小绘制指定的 的指定部分。

span.span: Draws the specified portion of the specified at the specified location and with the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. `srcRect`参数指定一个矩形部分的`image`对象来绘制。The `srcRect` parameter specifies a rectangular portion of the `image` object to draw. 此部分进行缩放和剪切，以适合由指定的平行四边形`destPoints`参数。This portion is scaled and sheared to fit inside the parallelogram specified by the `destPoints` parameter. 使用此重载`callback`和`callbackData`参数提供了根据条件和数据由应用程序启动后停止的图像的绘制的方法。This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application. 例如，应用程序可能开始绘制一个大图像，用户可能会滚动屏幕上，用例应用程序可以在其中停止绘制图像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 代码首先定义回调方法，以委托; 定义是过于简单，只是测试以了解是否方法调用它为 null`callBackData`参数。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 该示例的主要部分执行以下操作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 创建的实例回调方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建定义要在其中绘制图像的一个平行四边形的点。Creates points that define a parallelogram in which to draw the image. - 创建一个矩形来选择要绘制的图像的一部分。Creates a rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 设置图形绘制像素为单位。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加平行四边形。Creates an additional parallelogram in which to draw an adjusted image. - 创建并设置调整后的映像，以便具有比平常的伽玛值的属性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 对于原始、 未调整平行四边形中，该位置确定图像在屏幕上，并矩形和大小的大小和形状平行四边形的确定的缩放和剪切所绘制图像。For the original, unadjusted parallelogram, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the rectangle and the size and shape of the parallelogram determines the scaling and shearing of the drawn image. 因为此示例使用传递的重载`callBackData`参数，回调返回`false`，这将导致方法，若要继续，以及的示例将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `false`, which causes the method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#39)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#39)]

span.span: The image is scaled to fit the rectangle.

span.span: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.

param.name: srcY
param.span: 要绘制的源图像部分的左上角的 y 坐标。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.

span.span: Height of the portion of the source image to draw.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`对象来绘制。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 该矩形是相对于源映像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 此部分缩放以适合指定的矩形`destRect`参数。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建在其中绘制图像的目标矩形。Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 创建要从中提取图像的一部分的源矩形的坐标。Creates the coordinates of a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 设置源矩形的度量单位为像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 将图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the image to the screen. 目标矩形的位置确定图像在屏幕上，以及源和目标矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放和源矩形的大小确定原始图像的哪个部分绘制到屏幕。The position of the destination rectangle locates the image on the screen, and the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`对象来绘制。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 该矩形是相对于源映像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 此部分缩放以适合指定的矩形`destRect`参数。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建在其中绘制图像的目标矩形。Creates a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 创建要从中提取图像的一部分的源矩形的坐标。Creates the coordinates of a source rectangle from which to extract a portion of the image. - 设置源矩形的度量单位为像素。Sets the unit of measure of the source rectangle to pixels. - 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加矩形。Creates an additional rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image. - 创建并设置调整后的映像，以便具有比平常的伽玛值的属性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 原始的、 未调整目标矩形的位置确定图像在屏幕上，以及源和目标矩形的大小确定所绘制图像的缩放和源矩形的大小决定的哪些部分原始图像绘制到屏幕。For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the sizes of the source and destination rectangles determine the scaling of the drawn image, and the size of the source rectangle determines what portion of the original image is drawn to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#49](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#49)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#49](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#49)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#49](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#49)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`对象来绘制。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 该矩形是相对于源映像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 此部分缩放以适合指定的矩形`destRect`对象。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` object. 使用此重载`callback`参数提供了根据条件由应用程序启动后停止的图像的绘制的方法。This overload with the `callback` parameter provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria determined by the application. 例如，应用程序可能开始绘制一个大图像，用户可能会滚动屏幕上，用例应用程序可以在其中停止绘制图像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 代码首先定义回调方法，以委托; 定义是过于简单，只是测试以了解是否方法调用它为 null`callBackData`参数。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 该示例的主要部分执行以下操作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 创建的实例回调方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建定义在其中绘制图像的目标矩形的点。Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 创建一个源矩形来选择要绘制的图像的一部分。Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 设置图形绘制像素为单位。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加目标矩形。Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image. - 创建并设置调整后的映像，以便具有比平常的伽玛值的属性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 对于原始、 未调整目标矩形中，位置在屏幕上，确定图像和源矩形和大小的大小和形状目标矩形确定所绘制图像的缩放。For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image. 因为此示例使用未通过的重载`callBackData`参数，回调返回`true`，这将导致结束，并在示例中包含的异常处理代码的方法将输出异常文本而不是绘制图像。Because this example uses an overload that does not pass a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `true`, which causes the method to end, and the exception-handling code included in the example prints out the exception text rather than drawing the image. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `srcX`， `srcY`， `srcWidth`，和`srcHeight`参数指定的一个矩形部分`image`对象来绘制。The `srcX`, `srcY`, `srcWidth`, and `srcHeight` parameters specify a rectangular portion, of the `image` object to draw. 该矩形是相对于源映像的左上角。The rectangle is relative to the upper-left corner of the source image. 此部分缩放以适合指定的矩形`destRect`参数。This portion is scaled to fit inside the rectangle specified by the `destRect` parameter. 使用此重载`callback`和`callbackData`参数提供了根据条件和数据由应用程序启动后停止的图像的绘制的方法。This overload with the `callback` and `callbackData` parameters provides the means to stop the drawing of an image once it starts according to criteria and data determined by the application. 例如，应用程序可能开始绘制一个大图像，用户可能会滚动屏幕上，用例应用程序可以在其中停止绘制图像。For example, an application could start drawing a large image and the user might scroll the image off the screen, in which case the application could stop the drawing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 代码首先定义回调方法，以委托; 定义是过于简单，只是测试以了解是否方法调用它为 null`callBackData`参数。The code first defines a callback method for the delegate; the definition is simplistic and merely tests to see whether the method calls it with a null `callBackData` parameter. 该示例的主要部分执行以下操作：The main body of the example performs the following actions: - 创建的实例回调方法。Creates an instance of the callback method. - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建定义在其中绘制图像的目标矩形的点。Creates points that define a destination rectangle in which to draw the image. - 创建一个源矩形来选择要绘制的图像的一部分。Creates a source rectangle to select the portion of the image to draw. - 设置图形绘制像素为单位。Sets the graphics drawing unit to pixel. - 将原始图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the original image to the screen. - 创建要在其中绘制调整后的图像的附加目标矩形。Creates an additional destination rectangle in which to draw an adjusted image. - 创建并设置调整后的映像，以便具有比平常的伽玛值的属性。Creates and sets the attributes of the adjusted image to have a larger-than-usual gamma value. - 将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。Draws the adjusted image to the screen. 对于原始、 未调整目标矩形中，位置在屏幕上，确定图像和源矩形和大小的大小和形状目标矩形确定所绘制图像的缩放。For the original, unadjusted destination rectangle, the position locates the image on the screen, and the size of the source rectangle and the size and shape of the destination rectangle determines the scaling of the drawn image. 因为此示例使用传递的重载`callBackData`参数，回调返回`false`，这将导致方法，若要继续，以及的示例将调整后的图像绘制到屏幕。Because this example uses an overload that passes a `callBackData` parameter, the callback returns `false`, which causes the method to continue, and the example draws the adjusted image to the screen. summary.span: 在指定的位置使用图像的原始物理大小绘制指定的图像。

span.span: Draws a specified image using its original physical size at a specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储像素宽度值和水平分辨率 （每英寸点数） 的值。An stores a value for pixel width and a value for horizontal resolution (dots per inch). 物理宽度，以英寸为单位的单位是图像的像素宽度除以的水平分辨率。The physical width, measured in inches, of an image is the pixel width divided by the horizontal resolution. 例如，使用像素宽度为 216 和 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率的图像具有物理 3 英寸的宽度。For example, an image with a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch has a physical width of 3 inches. 说明同样适用于像素高度和物理的高度。Similar remarks apply to pixel height and physical height. 方法绘制一个图像使用的物理大小，因此该图像将出现正确的大小，以英寸为单位，而不考虑显示设备的分辨率 （每英寸点数）。The method draws an image using its physical size, so the image will have its correct size in inches regardless of the resolution (dots per inch) of the display device. 例如，假设图像具有像素宽度为 216 和 72 点 / 英寸的水平分辨率。For example, suppose an image has a pixel width of 216 and a horizontal resolution of 72 dots per inch. 如果调用绘制该图像的分辨率为 96 点 / 英寸的设备上，呈现的图像的像素宽度将是 (216/72) \* 96 = 288 条。If you call to draw that image on a device that has a resolution of 96 dots per inch, the pixel width of the rendered image will be (216/72)\*96 = 288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建从 JPEG 文件的文件夹中的示例 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个图像。Creates an image from a JPEG file SampImag.jpg in the folder of the example. - 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 绘制整个图像使用的物理大小。Draws the entire image using its physical size. param.name: pen
param.span: ，它确定扇形的颜色、宽度和样式。

span.span: structure that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse from which the pie shape comes.

param.name: startAngle
param.span: 从 x 轴到扇形的第一条边沿顺时针方向度量的角（以度为单位）。

span.span: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis to the first side of the pie shape.

param.name: sweepAngle

span.span: Angle measured in degrees clockwise from the startAngle parameter to the second side of the pie shape.

summary.span: 绘制由一个 结构和两条射线所指定的椭圆定义的扇形。

span.span: Draws a pie shape defined by an ellipse specified by a structure and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制一个椭圆和两条射线相交的一段弧线，弧的终结点与所定义的扇形。该椭圆的边框的定义。This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 饼图形状包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间交集的射线与椭圆弧。The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`参数为大于 360 度或小于-360 度时，它被视为，就好像 360 度或-360 度，分别。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建黑色的笔。Creates a black pen. - 创建限定整个椭圆的矩形。Creates a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse. - 定义在开始绘制 （相对于 x 轴） 的角度和用来绘制 （同时处于顺时针方向）。Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction). - 在屏幕上绘制饼图段。Draws the pie segment to the screen. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 饼图形状包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间交集的射线与椭圆弧。The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`参数为大于 360 度或小于-360 度时，它被视为，就好像 360 度或-360 度，分别。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建黑色的笔。Creates a black pen. - 创建限定整个椭圆的矩形。Creates a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse. - 定义在开始绘制 （相对于 x 轴） 的角度和用来绘制 （同时处于顺时针方向）。Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction). - 在屏幕上绘制饼图段。Draws the pie segment to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制一个椭圆和两条射线相交的一段弧线，弧的终结点与所定义的扇形。该椭圆定义由所描述的边框`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`参数。This method draws a pie shape defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle described by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters. 饼图形状包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间交集的射线与椭圆弧。The pie shape consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters, and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`参数为大于 360 度或小于-360 度时，它被视为，就好像 360 度或-360 度，分别。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建黑色的笔。Creates a black pen. - 创建的位置和限定整个椭圆的矩形的大小。Creates the position and size of a rectangle that bounds a complete ellipse. - 定义在开始绘制 （相对于 x 轴） 的角度和用来绘制 （同时处于顺时针方向）。Defines the angles at which to start drawing (relative to the x axis) and through which to draw (both in a clockwise direction). - 在屏幕上绘制扇形。Draws the pie shape to the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的两个连续点的每对指定多边形的边。Every pair of two consecutive points in the array specifies a side of the polygon. 此外，如果最后一个点和数组的第一个点不同时发生，它们指定多边形的最后一条边。In addition, if the last point and the first point of the array do not coincide, they specify the last side of the polygon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建黑色的笔。Creates a black pen. - 创建一个数组的七个点的多边形的顶点。Creates an array of seven points for the vertices of the polygon. - 在屏幕上绘制多边形。Draws the polygon to the screen. span.span: Closes the current graphics container and restores the state of this to the state saved by a call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此方法用于方法来创建嵌套的图形容器。Use this method with the method to create nested graphics containers. 图形容器保留的图形状态，例如转换、 剪辑区域和呈现属性。Graphics containers retain graphics state, such as transformation, clipping region, and rendering properties. 当您调用方法，保存的状态信息块放在堆栈上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法将返回，用于标识该信息块。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 当您标识将对象传递给方法，该信息块从堆栈中移除并用于还原时的状态为方法调用。When you pass the identifying object to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 可以嵌套容器;也就是说，可以调用方法在调用之前几次方法。Containers can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次调用方法中，信息块放置在堆栈上，并且您收到信息块。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 当传递到这些对象之一方法，返回到它所处的时间的状态方法调用返回了该特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 信息块放置在堆栈上的方法调用将从堆栈中，删除，所有信息块后，都放置在该堆栈上方法调用也将被删除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 调用方法相同调用堆栈上的位置信息块方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像方法调用搭配方法调用方法调用搭配方法调用。Just as an method call is paired with a method call, a method call is paired with a method call. 当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同样，当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 打开新的图形容器，并保存旧的容器。Opens a new graphics container and saves the old container. - 将转换的世界坐标以容器。Translates the world coordinates in the container. - 填入一个红色矩形 (转换的坐标) 新的容器。Fills a red rectangle in the (translated coordinates of the) new container. - 关闭新的容器并将还原已保存的容器。Closes the new container and restores the saved container. - 填充已保存容器的绿色矩形 （为未转换的坐标中）。Fills a green rectangle (to the untranslated coordinates) of the saved container. 结果是覆盖相同大小的红色矩形之上的绿色矩形。The result is a green rectangle that overlies a red rectangle of the same size. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，通过指定`callback`参数。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常情况下，回调方法调用"播放"，或绘图、 记录的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用，它必须通过调用实现方法的特定于正在枚举。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建具有的窗体作为它的私有成员之一。The following code example creates a form that has a as one of its private members. 方法调用，它调用窗体的`MetafileCallback`图元文件中每个记录的方法。The method calls , which calls the form's `MetafileCallback` method for each record in the metafile. `MetafileCallback` 方法调用 方法。The `MetafileCallback` method calls the method. 请注意，`MetafileCallback`方法接收作为记录数据，但方法需要记录数据的是字节数组。Notice that the `MetafileCallback` method receives the record data as an , but the method expects the record data to be a byte array. 在调用将记录数据复制到字节数组，以便它可以被传递给。The call to copies the record data to a byte array so that it can be passed to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，通过指定`callback`参数。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常情况下，回调方法调用"播放"，或绘图、 记录的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用，它必须通过调用实现方法的特定于正在枚举。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参见 。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，通过指定`callback`参数。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常情况下，回调方法调用"播放"，或绘图、 记录的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用，它必须通过调用实现方法的特定于正在枚举。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参见 。For a code example, see .

member this.EnumerateMetafile : System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile * System.Drawing.PointF[] * System.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafileProc * nativeint * System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes -> unit

param.name: metafile
param.span: 要枚举的 。

span.span: to enumerate.

param.name: destPoints
param.span: 由三个 结构组成的数组，这三个结构定义一个用来确定所绘制图元文件的大小和位置的平行四边形。

span.span: Array of three structures that define a parallelogram that determines the size and location of the drawn metafile.

param.name: callback
param.span: 委托，它指定将图元文件记录发送到的方法。

span.span: delegate that specifies the method to which the metafile records are sent.

param.name: callbackData
param.span: 必需但被忽略的内部指针。

span.span: Internal pointer that is required, but ignored.

param.span: 可以为此参数传递 。

span.span: You can pass for this parameter.

param.name: imageAttr
param.span: ，它指定所绘制图像的图像特性信息。

span.span: that specifies image attribute information for the drawn image.

summary.span: 将指定 中的记录逐个发送到回调方法，以在指定的平行四边形中用指定的图像特性显示。

span.span: Sends the records in the specified , one at a time, to a callback method for display in a specified parallelogram using specified image attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，通过指定`callback`参数。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常情况下，回调方法调用"播放"，或绘图、 记录的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用，它必须通过调用实现方法的特定于正在枚举。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 指定的图像特性`imageAttr`指定何时写入图元文件的那些参数替换。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参见 。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，通过指定`callback`参数。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常情况下，回调方法调用"播放"，或绘图、 记录的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用，它必须通过调用实现方法的特定于正在枚举。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 指定的矩形之外的任何绘制发生`srcRect`参数将被忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参见 。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，通过指定`callback`参数。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常情况下，回调方法调用"播放"，或绘图、 记录的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用，它必须通过调用实现方法的特定于正在枚举。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 指定的矩形之外的任何绘制发生`srcRect`参数将被忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参见 。For a code example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，通过指定`callback`参数。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常情况下，回调方法调用"播放"，或绘图、 记录的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用，它必须通过调用实现方法的特定于正在枚举。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. 指定的矩形之外的任何绘制发生`srcRect`参数将被忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. 指定的图像特性`imageAttr`指定何时写入图元文件的那些参数替换。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参见 。For a code example, see .
