remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法枚举指定图元文件中包含的记录。This method enumerates the records contained in the specified metafile. 每个记录分别发送到回调方法，通过指定`callback`参数。Each record is individually sent to a callback method specified by the `callback` parameter. 通常情况下，回调方法调用"播放"，或绘图、 记录的方法。Typically, the callback method calls the method to "play back", or draw, the record. 如果回调方法调用，它必须通过调用实现方法的特定于正在枚举。If the callback method calls , it must do so by calling the method of the specific that is being enumerated. `destPoints`参数指定的平行四边形的三个点。The `destPoints` parameter specifies three points of a parallelogram. 这三个结构表示的平行四边形的左上角、 右上方和左下角。The three structures represent the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the parallelogram. 第四个点推断出的前三个以形成一个平行四边形。The fourth point is extrapolated from the first three to form a parallelogram. 缩放和剪切以适合的平行四边形绘制图元文件。The drawn metafile is scaled and sheared to fit the parallelogram. 指定的矩形之外的任何绘制发生`srcRect`参数将被忽略。Any drawing that takes place outside of the rectangle specified by the `srcRect` parameter is ignored. 指定的图像特性`imageAttr`指定何时写入图元文件的那些参数替换。The image attributes specified by the `imageAttr` parameter replace those specified when the metafile was written. ## Examples 有关代码示例，请参见 。For a code example, see .

Public Sub ExcludeClip (rect As Rectangle)
public: void ExcludeClip(System::Drawing::Rectangle rect);
member this.ExcludeClip : System.Drawing.Rectangle -> unit

param.name: rect
param.span: 结构，它指定要从剪辑区域排除的矩形。

span.span: structure that specifies the rectangle to exclude from the clip region.

summary.span: 更新此 的剪辑区域，以排除 结构所指定的区域。

span.span: Updates the clip region of this to exclude the area specified by a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不包括所指定的区域`rect`为当前剪辑区域中的参数，并将分配到结果区域属性的。This method excludes the area specified by the `rect` parameter from the current clip region and assigns the resulting area to the property of this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建 100 像素 x 100 像素的矩形的左上角位于坐标 （100，100）。Creates a 100 pixel by 100 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (100, 100). - 创建由矩形来定义一个区域。Creates a region defined by the rectangle. - 若要排除的矩形区域的剪辑区域设置。Sets the clipping region to exclude the rectangular region. - X 300 像素的矩形的左上角位于坐标 （0，0） 用纯色的蓝色画笔填充 300 像素。Fills a 300 pixel by 300 pixel rectangle whose upper-left corner is at the coordinate (0, 0) with a solid blue brush. 结果是蓝色矩形，其右下角方向缺少一个正方形区域。The result is a blue rectangle with a square region toward its lower-right corner missing. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#92)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#92)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#92](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#92)]

summary.span: 填充由 结构数组定义的闭合基数样条曲线的内部。

span.span: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of structures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法填充的闭合基数样条，通过在数组中每个点的内部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，附加曲线段在最后一个点添加到第一个点，以将其关闭。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 点的数组必须包含至少四个结构。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 此方法使用默认张力 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建实心的红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建四个点定义样条的数组。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 填充在屏幕上的曲线。Fills the curve on the screen. 曲线具有默认张力 0.5。The curve has a default tension of 0.5. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CPP/form1.cpp#93)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/CS/form1.cs#93)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2#93](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples2/VB/form1.vb#93)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法填充的闭合基数样条，通过在数组中每个点的内部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，附加曲线段在最后一个点添加到第一个点，以将其关闭。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 点的数组必须包含至少四个结构。The array of points must contain at least four structures. 此方法使用默认张力 0.5。This method uses a default tension of 0.5. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建实心的红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建四个点定义样条的数组。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 填充在屏幕上的曲线。Fills the curve on the screen. 曲线具有默认张力 0.5。The curve has a default tension of 0.5. span.span: Fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline curve defined by an array of structures using the specified fill mode and tension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法填充的闭合基数样条，通过在数组中每个点的内部。This method fills the interior of a closed cardinal spline that passes through each point in the array. 如果最后一个点不匹配的第一个点，附加曲线段在最后一个点添加到第一个点，以将其关闭。If the last point does not match the first point, an additional curve segment is added from the last point to the first point to close it. 点的数组必须包含至少四个结构。The array of points must contain at least four structures. `tension`参数确定的自由绘制曲线形状。The `tension` parameter determines the shape of the spline. 如果的值`tension`参数为 0.0F 时，此方法绘制直线段连接的点。If the value of the `tension` parameter is 0.0F, this method draws straight line segments to connect the points. 通常情况下，`tension`参数小于或等于 1.0 f。Usually, the `tension` parameter is less than or equal to 1.0F. 超过 1.0 f 的值将产生不正常的结果。Values over 1.0F produce unusual results. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建实心的红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建四个点定义样条的数组。Creates an array of four points to define a spline. - 填充模式设置为。Sets the fill mode to . - 设置为 1.0 的张力。Sets the tension to 1.0. - 填充在屏幕上的曲线。Fills the curve on the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将填充与的椭圆的内部。This method fills the interior of an ellipse with a . 该椭圆定义由所表示的边框`x`， `y`， `width`，和`height`参数。The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle represented by the `x`, `y`, `width`, and `height` parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建实心的红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建的位置和限定椭圆的矩形的大小。Creates the location and size of a rectangle that bounds an ellipse. - 填充椭圆在屏幕上。Fills the ellipse on the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个包含一系列直线和曲线的段。A consists of a series of line and curve segments. 如果使用路径表示`path`参数未闭合，添加额外的线段在最后一个点来闭合该路径的第一个点。If the path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建实心的红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建图形路径对象。Creates a graphics path object. - 向图形路径添加一个椭圆。Adds an ellipse to the graphics path. - 填充在屏幕上的路径。Fills the path on the screen. span.span: Fills the interior of a pie section defined by an ellipse specified by a structure and two radial lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法填充由一段弧线的椭圆和两条射线相交的与弧的终结点定义的扇形区的内部。该椭圆的边框的定义。This method fills the interior of a pie section defined by an arc of an ellipse and the two radial lines that intersect with the endpoints of the arc. The ellipse is defined by the bounding rectangle. 扇形区包含定义的两条射线`startAngle`和`sweepAngle`参数和之间交集的射线与椭圆弧。The pie section consists of the two radial lines defined by the `startAngle` and `sweepAngle` parameters and the arc between the intersections of those radial lines with the ellipse. 如果`sweepAngle`参数为大于 360 度或小于-360 度时，它被视为，就好像 360 度或-360 度，分别。If the `sweepAngle` parameter is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, it is treated as if it were 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建实心的红色画笔。Creates a solid red brush. - 创建限定椭圆的矩形。Creates a rectangle that bounds an ellipse. - 定义 （相对于 x 轴） 的开始角度和扫描角度 （同时处于顺时针方向）。Defines the start angle (relative to the x axis) and the sweep angle (both in a clockwise direction). - 填充椭圆在屏幕上的饼形区域。Fills the pie-shaped area of the ellipse on the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个数组中的两个连续点指定多边形的边。Every two consecutive points in the array specify a side of the polygon. 此外，如果最后一个点和第一个点不同时发生，它们指定多边形的右端。In addition, if the last point and the first point do not coincide, they specify the closing side of the polygon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建纯蓝色画笔。Creates a solid blue brush. - 创建七个点来定义多边形的数组。Creates an array of seven points to define a polygon. - 填充屏幕上的多边形区域。Fills the polygonal area on the screen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法启动刷新，而无需等待任何当前正在执行图形操作完成时立即返回。This method starts a flush and returns immediately without waiting for any currently executing graphics operation to finish.

span.span: Member of the enumeration that specifies whether the method returns immediately or waits for any existing operations to finish.

summary.span: 用此方法强制执行所有挂起的图形操作，按照指定，等待或者不等待，在操作完成之前返回。

span.span: Forces execution of all pending graphics operations with the method waiting or not waiting, as specified, to return before the operations finish.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为有关`intention`参数指定该方法返回从开始时的值在刷新后立即指定返回前等待该方法，直到所有现有的操作完成。A value of for the `intention` parameter specifies that the method return immediately after beginning the flush, while a value of specifies that the method wait before returning until any existing operations finish.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应始终调用方法，以释放和相关的资源创建的方法。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. 即使显示设备的关联的 ICM 颜色配置文件，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不会默认情况下使用该配置文件。Even if the display device has an associated ICM color profile, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] will not use that profile by default. 若要启用的 ICM ，构造HDC 后 HDC （和 ICM_ON） 传递给从`SetICMMode`函数。To enable ICM for a , construct the from an HDC after you pass the HDC (and ICM_ON) to the `SetICMMode` function. 然后通过任何绘图将根据关联的显示设备的 ICM 配置文件进行调整。Then any drawing done by the will be adjusted according to the ICM profile associated with the display device. 启用 ICM 将导致性能下降。Enabling ICM will result in slower performance. 调用时的设备上下文 （映射模式、 逻辑单元等） 的状态可能会影响呈现通过。The state of the device context (mapping mode, logical unit, and the like) at the time you call can affect rendering done by the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following action: - 创建一个内部指针类型变量`hdc`并将其设置为窗体的图形对象的设备上下文的句柄。Creates an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets it to the handle to the device context of the graphics object of the form. - 创建一个新的图形对象使用`hdc`。Creates a new graphics object using `hdc`. - （屏幕） 上绘制一个具有新的图形对象的矩形。Draws a rectangle with the new graphics object (on the screen). - 释放新图形对象使用`hdc`。Releases the new graphics object using `hdc`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#118)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#118)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#118](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#118)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图像具有索引的像素格式，此方法将引发异常并显示消息，"图形对象不能从映像创建具有索引的像素格式。"If the image has an indexed pixel format, this method throws an exception with the message, "A Graphics object cannot be created from an image that has an indexed pixel format." 以下列表中显示索引的像素格式。The indexed pixel formats are shown in the following list. - - - 您可以将索引的图像保存为另一种格式中使用方法，然后检索对象为新映像。You can save the indexed image as another format by using the method and then retrieve a object for the new image. 如果该图像具有任一以下的像素格式，则此方法还会引发异常。This method also throws an exception if the image has any of the following pixel formats. - - - - 应始终调用方法，以释放和相关的资源创建的方法。You should always call the method to release the and related resources created by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following action: - 创建从一种图形文件 sampimag.jpg 位于同示例文件夹中。Creates an from a graphics file SampImag.jpg in the example folder. - 创建从。Creates a from the . - 通过填充在其中一个矩形来改变该图像。Alters the image by filling a rectangle within it. - 绘制到屏幕。Draws the to the screen. - 释放所创建。Releases the created . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#120)]

summary.span: 获取当前 Windows 的半色调调色板的句柄。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目的方法是启用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]时可生成更好的质量半色调显示使用每像素 8 位。The purpose of the method is to enable [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] to produce a better quality halftone when the display uses 8 bits per pixel. 若要显示的图像使用半色调调色板，请使用以下过程。To display an image using the halftone palette, use the following procedure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 定义的互操作性属性包含所需的 Windows DLL 文件 gdi32.dll[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。Defines interoperability attributes for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll, which contains the necessary [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. - 定义`SelectPalette`和`RealizePalette`为外部该 DLL 中的函数。Defines the `SelectPalette` and `RealizePalette` functions in that DLL as external. - 从 sampimag.jpg （它必须在示例代码文件所在的同一文件夹中） 位于同一个现有图像文件创建映像并将图像绘制到屏幕。Creates an image from an existing image file SampImag.jpg (which must be in the same folder as the example code file) and draws the image to the screen. - 创建内部指针类型的变量并将其值分别设置为图形对象和当前 Windows 半色调调色板的句柄。Creates internal pointer type variables and sets their values to the handle to the graphics object and to the current Windows halftone palette, respectively. - 选择和实现半色调调色板。Selects and realizes the halftone palette. - 创建一个新的图形对象使用`hdc`参数。Creates a new graphics object using the `hdc` parameter. - 再次绘制的图像。Draws the image again. - 释放设备上下文的句柄。Releases the handle to the device context. 结果是两个呈现的示例图像： 一种具有 16 位调色板，另一个使用 8 位调色板。The result is two renderings of the sample image: one with the 16-bit palette and one with the 8-bit palette. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#121)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#121)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#121](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#121)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)

summary.span: 获取与此 关联的设备上下文的句柄。

span.span: Gets the handle to the device context associated with this .

returns.span: 与此 关联的设备上下文的句柄。

span.span: Handle to the device context associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设备上下文是一种 Windows 结构基于[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，它定义一组图形对象和其关联的属性，以及影响输出的图形模式。The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output. 此方法返回一种字体除了该设备上下文。This method returns that device context with the exception of a font. 由于未选择一种字体，调用方法使用从返回的句柄方法将失败。Because a font is not selected, calls to the method using a handle returned from the method will fail. 调用和方法必须成对出现。Calls to the and methods must appear in pairs. 期间的作用域并方法对您通常仅对进行调用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。During the scope of a and method pair, you usually make only calls to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. 在该作用域对[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]的方法生成`hdc`参数因`ObjectBusy`错误。Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error. 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]将忽略进行的任何状态更改的`hdc`后续操作中的参数。Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该示例演示如何调用 Windows[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数来执行相同的任务[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 定义互操作性Windows DLL 文件 gdi32.dll 的属性。Defines the interoperability attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll. 此 DLL 包含所需[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 定义为外部该 DLL 中的函数。Defines the function in that DLL as external. - 创建红色笔。Creates a red pen. - 使用笔，向屏幕使用绘制一个矩形[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. - 定义一个内部指针类型变量`hdc`并将其值设置为窗体的设备上下文的句柄。Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form. - 向屏幕使用绘制一个矩形[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 释放所表示的设备上下文`hdc`参数。Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#122)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#122)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#122)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 使用 ARGB 坐标 （255，165，63，第 136） 创建随机的颜色。Creates an arbitrary color with ARGB coordinates (255, 165, 63, 136). - 创建实心画笔，并将其颜色设置为指定的颜色。Creates a solid brush and sets its color to the specified color. - 填充椭圆使用随机的颜色。Fills an ellipse using the arbitrary color. - 创建第二种颜色，并将其设置为最接近的系统 ARGB 颜色。Creates a second color and sets its value to the nearest system ARGB color. - 使用此颜色填充第二个椭圆。Fills a second ellipse with this color. 结果是两个椭圆组成： 第一个使用任意指定的颜色和第二个使用最近的指定颜色的系统颜色绘制绘制。The result is two ellipses: the first drawn with the arbitrary specified color and the second drawn with the system color nearest the specified color. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#123)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#123)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#123](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#123)]

member this.IntersectClip : System.Drawing.Rectangle -> unit

param.name: rect
param.span: 与当前剪辑区域相交的 结构。

span.span: structure to intersect with the current clip region.

summary.span: 将此 的剪辑区域更新为当前剪辑区域与指定 结构的交集。

span.span: Updates the clip region of this to the intersection of the current clip region and the specified structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将分配给属性的这所表示为当前剪辑区域和指定的矩形的交集的区域`rect`参数。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形左上角位于 （0，0） 和剪辑区域设置与此矩形。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 创建其左上角位于第二个矩形 （100，100），并设置为当前剪辑区域 （第一个矩形） 此矩形的交集的剪辑区域。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 填充一个大的矩形包含用纯色的蓝色画笔前两个矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 将剪辑区域重置为无限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 在两个剪辑区域周围绘制矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它使用黑色笔的第一个剪辑矩形和红色钢笔的第二个剪辑区域。It uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 结果是只有两个矩形的交集用蓝色填充。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#124)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#124)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#124](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#124)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将分配给属性的这所表示为当前剪辑区域和指定的区域的交集的区域`region`参数。This method assigns to the property of this the area represented by the intersection of the current clip region and the region specified by the `region` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形左上角位于 （0，0）。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0). - 创建区域并将其设置为矩形，并到此区域设置的剪辑区域。Creates a region and sets it to the rectangle, and sets the clipping region to this region. - 创建其左上角位于第二个矩形 （100，100）。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100). - 创建区域并将其设置为第二个矩形，并的剪辑区域设置使用的合并模式的此区域与当前剪辑区域 （第一个矩形） 交集。Creates a region and sets it to the second rectangle, and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this region and the current clipping region (the first rectangle) using a combine mode of . - 填充包含前两个用纯色的蓝色画笔的大矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous regions with a solid blue brush. - 将剪辑区域重置为无限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 在两个剪辑区域周围绘制矩形。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions. 它使用黑色笔的第一个剪辑区域和红色钢笔的第二个剪辑区域。It uses a black pen for the first clipping region and a red pen for the second clipping region. 结果是仅在两个区域的交集用蓝色填充。The result is that only the intersection of the two regions is filled with blue. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建矩形的剪辑区域，并将其设置为窗体使用的图形对象的剪辑区域。Creates a rectangular clipping region and sets it as the clipping region for the graphics object of the form using . - 创建两个点，一个剪辑区域内，一个外部。Creates two points, one inside the clipping region and one outside. - 测试每个可见性的点，并绘制只可见一个。Tests each of the points for visibility and draws only the visible one. 结果是一个小红色圆圈，剪辑区域内。The result is one small red circle, which is within the clip region. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的区域是准确性的依赖于分辨率的因此如果字符串是准确性的一种解决方法在图元文件中记录和更高版本播放在不同的解决方法可能会略有下降。The regions returned by this method are resolution-dependent, so there might be a slight loss of accuracy if strings are recorded in a metafile at one resolution and later played back at a different resolution. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 设置一个字符串，"第一个和第二个范围"和字符串 ("Times New Roman"，16 点) 的显示字体。Sets a string "First and Second ranges" and a font for display of the string ("Times New Roman", 16 point). - 设置两个字符的字符串中的范围 （分别对应的词"First"和"第二个"）。Sets two character ranges within the string (which correspond to the words "First" and "Second"). - 创建要在其中显示字符串的矩形。Creates a rectangle in which to display the string. - 设置格式的字符串包括两个字符范围。Sets the formatting of the string ¾ including the two character ranges. - 在屏幕上绘制的字符串。Draws the string to the screen. - 度量值的字符范围，将确定绑定两个指定的范围的矩形。Measures the character ranges, determines rectangles that bound the two specified ranges. - 将两个矩形绘制到屏幕。Draws the two rectangles to the screen. 结果是与第一个范围 ("First") 受一个红色矩形和第二个范围 （"第二个"） 受蓝色矩形显示的字符串。The result is the displayed string with the first range ("First") bounded by a red rectangle and the second range ("Second") bounded by a blue rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在用于使用包含单个字符串，并包括少量的额外空间之前和之后要允许突出的标志符号的字符串。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，方法调整标志符号点以优化显示质量，并可能会显示一个字符串，窄于报告的。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 若要获取适用于布局 （例如，实现格式化文本时） 中的相邻字符串的指标，请使用方法或之一方法采用，并将传递。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a , and pass . 另外，请确保有关是。Also, ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建要测量的字符串。Creates a string to measure. - 创建一个 font 对象并将其设置为 Arial （16 磅）。Creates a font object and sets it to Arial (16 point). - 创建大小对象并使用它和字体对象来度量的字符串的大小。Creates a size object and uses it and the font object to measure the size of the string. - 使用绘制一个红色矩形所测得的字符串的大小。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 绘制绘制的矩形内的字符串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks `width`参数指定返回的宽度分量的最大值结构 ()。The `width` parameter specifies the maximum value of the width component of the returned structure (). 如果`width`参数是字符串，将返回的实际宽度小于组件将被截断为一个值，表示的最大适合指定的宽度的字符数。If the `width` parameter is less than the actual width of the string, the returned component is truncated to a value representing the maximum number of characters that will fit within the specified width. 可容纳整个字符串，返回的组件将会调整为允许显示使用字符换行字符串的值。To accommodate the entire string, the returned component is adjusted to a value that allows displaying the string with character wrap. 方法旨在用于使用包含单个字符串，并包括少量的额外空间之前和之后要允许突出的标志符号的字符串。The method is designed for use with individual strings and includes a small amount of extra space before and after the string to allow for overhanging glyphs. 此外，方法调整标志符号点以优化显示质量，并可能会显示一个字符串，窄于报告的。Also, the method adjusts glyph points to optimize display quality and might display a string narrower than reported by . 若要获取适用于布局 （例如，实现格式化文本时） 中的相邻字符串的指标，请使用方法或之一方法采用，并将传递。To obtain metrics suitable for adjacent strings in layout (for example, when implementing formatted text), use the method or one of the methods that takes a , and pass . 另外，请确保有关是。Also, ensure the for the is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建要测量的字符串和字体对象设置为 Arial （16 点）。Creates a string to measure and a font object set to Arial (16 point). - 设置字符串的最大宽度。Sets the maximum width of the string. - 创建一个大小对象并使用它、 字体对象和字符串最大宽度来测量的字符串的大小。Creates a size object and uses it, the font object, and the maximum string width to measure the size of the string. - 使用绘制一个红色矩形所测得的字符串的大小。Draws a red rectangle using the measured size of the string. - 绘制绘制的矩形内的字符串。Draws the string within the drawn rectangle. span.span: Multiplies the world transformation of this and specified the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法预先计算指定的矩阵`matrix`参数，以使结果`matrix`x 世界转换。This method prepends the matrix specified by the `matrix` parameter, so that the result is `matrix` x world transformation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建`transformMatrix`矩阵 （由两个单位矩阵加上零转换向量）。Creates a `transformMatrix` matrix (a two by two identity matrix plus a zero-translation vector). - 平移矢量 （200，100） 的转换矩阵。Translates the transform matrix by a vector (200, 100). - Windows 窗体的世界转换矩阵旋转 30 度，前面添加到窗体的变换矩阵的 30 度的旋转矩阵。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees, prepends the rotation matrix for 30 degrees to the form's transformation matrix. - 旋转的世界转换矩阵乘以已翻译`transformMatrix`，并将前面添加`transformMatrix`到世界转换矩阵。Multiplies the rotated world transformation matrix by the translated `transformMatrix`, and prepends the `transformMatrix` to the world transformation matrix. - 绘制旋转、 平移的椭圆。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#143)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#143)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#143](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#143)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为有关`order`参数指定乘法的顺序是`matrix`x 世界转换。A value of for the `order` parameter specifies that the order of the multiplication is `matrix` x world transformation. 值为有关`order`指定乘法的顺序是世界转换 x `matrix`。A value of for `order` specifies that the order of the multiplication is world transformation x `matrix`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建`transformMatrix`矩阵 （由两个单位矩阵加上零转换向量）。Creates a `transformMatrix` matrix (a two by two identity matrix plus a zero-translation vector). - 平移矢量 （200，100） 的转换矩阵。Translates the transform matrix by a vector (200, 100). - Windows 窗体的世界转换矩阵旋转 30 度，前面添加到窗体的变换矩阵的 30 度的旋转矩阵。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees, prepending the rotation matrix for 30 degrees to the form's transformation matrix. - 旋转的世界转换矩阵乘以经过平移`transformMatrix`中，追加`transformMatrix`到世界转换矩阵。Multiplies the rotated world transformation matrix by the translated `transformMatrix`, appending the `transformMatrix` to the world transformation matrix. - 绘制旋转、 平移的椭圆。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse. remarks.format: ## Remarks 图形单元是用于在此页坐标的度量单位。The graphics unit is the unit of measure used for page coordinates in this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了更改的效果属性。The following code example demonstrates the effect of changing the property. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ChangePageUnit`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ChangePageUnit` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 设备上下文是一种 Windows 结构基于[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]，它定义一组图形对象和其关联的属性，以及影响输出的图形模式。The device context is a Windows structure based on [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] that defines a set of graphical objects and their associated attributes, as well as the graphical modes that affect output. 调用和方法必须成对出现。Calls to the and methods must appear in pairs. 期间的作用域并方法对您通常进行调用只能与[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。During the scope of a and method pair, you usually make calls only to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] functions. 在该作用域对[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]的方法生成`hdc`参数因`ObjectBusy`错误。Calls in that scope made to [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] methods of the that produced the `hdc` parameter fail with an `ObjectBusy` error. 此外，[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]将忽略进行的任何状态更改的`hdc`后续操作中的参数。Also, [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] ignores any state changes made to the of the `hdc` parameter in subsequent operations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该示例演示如何调用 Windows[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数来执行相同的任务[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。The example illustrates calling a Windows [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function to perform the same task as a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 定义互操作性Windows DLL 文件 gdi32.dll 的属性。Defines the interoperability attribute for the Windows DLL file gdi32.dll. 此 DLL 包含所需[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数，并且它定义为外部该 DLL 中的函数。This DLL contains the desired [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function, and it defines the function in that DLL as external. - 创建红色笔。Creates a red pen. - 使用笔，向屏幕使用绘制一个矩形[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]方法。With the pen, draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] method. - 定义一个内部指针类型变量`hdc`并将其值设置为窗体的设备上下文的句柄。Defines an internal pointer type variable `hdc` and sets its value to the handle to the device context of the form. - 向屏幕使用绘制一个矩形[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]函数。Draws a rectangle to the screen using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] function. - 释放所表示的设备上下文`hdc`参数。Releases the device context represented by the `hdc` parameter. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#145](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#145)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#145](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#145)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#145](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#145)]

summary.span: 将此 的剪辑区域重置为无限区域。

span.span: Resets the clip region of this to an infinite region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时的剪辑区域为无限制，此项绘制不被剪辑。When the clipping region of a is infinite, items that this draws are not clipped. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形左上角位于 （0，0） 和剪辑区域设置与此矩形。Creates a rectangle with upper-left corner at (0, 0) and sets the clipping region to this rectangle. - 创建其左上角位于第二个矩形 （100，100），并设置为当前剪辑区域 （第一个矩形） 此矩形的交集的剪辑区域。Creates a second rectangle with upper-left corner at (100, 100) and sets the clipping region to the intersection of this rectangle and the current clipping region (the first rectangle). - 填充一个大的矩形包含用纯色的蓝色画笔前两个矩形。Fills a large rectangle that includes both previous rectangles with a solid blue brush. - 将剪辑区域重置为无限。Resets the clipping region to infinite. - 在两个剪辑区域中; 周围绘制矩形它使用黑色笔的第一个剪辑矩形和红色钢笔的第二个剪辑区域。Draws rectangles around the two clipping regions; it uses a black pen for the first clipping rectangle and a red pen for the second clipping region. 结果是只有两个矩形的交集用蓝色填充。The result is that only the intersection of the two rectangles is filled with blue. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#146)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#146)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#146](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#146)]

summary.span: 将此 的世界变换矩阵重置为单位矩阵。

span.span: Resets the world transformation matrix of this to the identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 恒等矩阵表示无缩放、 旋转或平移转换。The identity matrix represents a transformation with no scaling, rotation, or translation. 重置此世界转换恒等矩阵意味着其世界转换不会更改的已转换项目的几何。Resetting the world transformation of this to the identity matrix means that its world transformation does not change the geometry of transformed items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - Windows 窗体的世界转换平移矢量 （100，0）。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 保存窗体的图形状态。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 将窗体的世界转换重置为标识，并使用实心的红色画笔填充矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 还原已翻译的图形状态，并使用纯色的蓝色画笔填充的矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a rectangle with a solid blue brush. 结果是一个未转换的红色填充的矩形和已翻译的蓝色填充的矩形。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#147)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#147)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#147](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#147)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您调用方法，保存的状态信息块放在堆栈上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法将返回，用于标识该信息块。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 传递标识到方法，从堆栈中移除和用于还原信息块时的状态为方法调用。When you pass the identifying to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 请注意，对给定调用返回方法可以一次传递给`Restore`方法。Note that the returned by a given call to the method can be passed only once to the `Restore` method. 调用方法可以嵌套; 也就是说，可以调用方法在调用之前几次方法。Calls to the method can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次调用方法中，信息块放置在堆栈上，并且您收到信息块。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 当传递到这些对象之一方法，返回到它所处的时间的状态方法调用返回了该特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 信息块放置在堆栈上的方法调用将从堆栈中，删除，所有信息块后，都放置在该堆栈上方法调用也将被删除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 调用方法相同调用堆栈上的位置信息块方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像调用搭配调用，请方法调用搭配方法调用。Just as a call is paired with a call, a method call is paired with a method call. 当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同样，当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。Likewise, when you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - Windows 窗体的世界转换平移矢量 （100，0）。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 保存窗体的图形状态。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 将窗体的世界转换重置为标识，并使用实心的红色画笔填充矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 还原已翻译的图形状态，并使用纯色的蓝色画笔填充第二个矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a second rectangle with a solid blue brush. 结果是一个未转换的红色填充的矩形和已翻译的蓝色填充的矩形。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle and a translated blue-filled rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#148](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#148)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#148](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#148)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#148](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#148)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 旋转操作包括将其元素派生自的矩阵转换矩阵乘以`angle`参数。The rotation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose elements are derived from the `angle` parameter. 此方法通过预置到转换矩阵应用旋转。This method applies the rotation by prepending it to the transformation matrix. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - Windows 窗体的世界转换矩阵平移矢量 （100，0）。Translates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by the vector (100, 0). - 旋转 30 度，前面添加旋转矩阵到世界转换矩阵的角度的世界转换。Rotates the world transformation by an angle of 30 degrees, prepending the rotation matrix to the world transformation matrix. - 使用蓝色笔绘制旋转、 平移的椭圆。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse with a blue pen. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您调用方法，保存的状态信息块放在堆栈上。When you call the method of a , an information block that holds the state of the is put on a stack. 方法将返回，用于标识该信息块。The method returns a that identifies that information block. 传递标识到方法，从堆栈中移除和用于还原信息块时的状态为方法调用。When you pass the identifying to the method, the information block is removed from the stack and is used to restore the to the state it was in at the time of the method call. 请注意，对给定调用返回方法可以一次传递给方法。Note that the returned by a given call to the method can be passed only once to the method. 调用方法可以嵌套; 也就是说，可以调用方法在调用之前几次方法。Calls to the method can be nested; that is, you can call the method several times before you call the method. 每次调用方法中，信息块放置在堆栈上，并且您收到信息块。Each time you call the method, an information block is put on the stack, and you receive a for the information block. 当传递到这些对象之一方法，返回到它所处的时间的状态方法调用返回了该特定。When you pass one of those objects to the method, the is returned to the state it was in at the time of the method call that returned that particular . 信息块放置在堆栈上的方法调用将从堆栈中，删除，所有信息块后，都放置在该堆栈上方法调用也将被删除。The information block placed on the stack by that method call is removed from the stack, and all information blocks placed on that stack after that method call are also removed. 调用方法相同调用堆栈上的位置信息块方法。Calls to the method place information blocks on the same stack as calls to the method. 就像调用搭配调用，请方法调用搭配方法调用。Just as a call is paired with a call, a method call is paired with a method call. 当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. 同样，当您调用方法中，所有信息块都放置在堆栈上 (通过方法或通过方法) 后的对应调用方法从堆栈中移除。Likewise, When you call the method, all information blocks placed on the stack (by the method or by the method) after the corresponding call to the method are removed from the stack. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - Windows 窗体的世界转换平移矢量 （100，0）。Translates the world transform of the Windows Form by a vector (100, 0). - 保存窗体的图形状态。Saves the graphics state of the form. - 将窗体的世界转换重置为标识 （2 x 2 恒等矩阵加上零向量转换），并使用实心的红色画笔填充矩形。Resets the world transform of the form to an identity (2x2 identity matrix plus a zero-vector translation) and fills a rectangle with a solid red brush. - 还原已翻译的图形状态，并使用纯色的蓝色画笔填充的矩形。Restores the translated graphics state and fills a rectangle with a solid blue brush. 结果是一个未转换的红色填充的矩形在左边和已翻译的蓝色填充矩形在窗体的右侧。The result is an untranslated red-filled rectangle on the left and a translated blue-filled rectangle on the right of the form. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#151](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#151)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#151](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#151)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#151](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#151)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在缩放操作包括将它的元素的对角矩阵转换矩阵乘以 (`sx`， `sy`，1)。The scaling operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a diagonal matrix whose elements are (`sx`, `sy`, 1). 此方法预先计算的转换矩阵的缩放矩阵。This method prepends the transformation matrix of the by the scaling matrix. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 旋转 30 度的 Windows 窗体的世界转换矩阵。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30 degrees. - 通过预先计算的缩放转换按沿 x 方向的 3 倍和因子为 1 沿 y 方向缩放该矩阵。Scales that matrix by a factor of 3 in the x direction and a factor of 1 in the y direction by prepending the scaling transformation. - 使用蓝色笔绘制缩放、 旋转矩形。Draws a scaled, rotated rectangle with a blue pen. 结果仍是一个矩形。The result is still a rectangle. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用的图形路径表示`path`参数未闭合，添加额外的线段在最后一个点来闭合该路径的第一个点。If the graphics path represented by the `path` parameter is not closed, an additional segment is added from the last point to the first point to close the path. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径并向该路径添加一个椭圆。Creates a graphics path and adds an ellipse to the path. - 剪辑区域设置为椭圆路径。Sets the clipping region to the elliptical path. - 使用纯黑色画笔填充一个大的矩形。Fills a large rectangle with a solid black brush. 结果是黑色的实心椭圆。The result is a filled, black ellipse. remarks.format: ## Remarks 平滑模式指定直线、 曲线和已填充区域的边缘是否使用平滑处理 （也称为抗锯齿）。The smoothing mode specifies whether lines, curves, and the edges of filled areas use smoothing (also called antialiasing). 一个例外是路径渐变画笔不遵守平滑模式。One exception is that path gradient brushes do not obey the smoothing mode. 使用填充的区域呈现相同的方式 （别名） 而不考虑属性。Areas filled using a are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the property. ## Examples 以下方法演示了设置的效果， ，和属性。The following method demonstrates the effects of setting the , , and properties. 该示例的输出如下图所示。The output of the example is shown in the following illustration. ![具有和没有应用平滑处理的行。](~/add/media/gdi-smoothingmode.png "具有和没有应用平滑处理的行。")![Lines with and without smoothing applied.](~/add/media/gdi-smoothingmode.png "Lines with and without smoothing applied.") 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到窗体并调用`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`方法时处理该窗体事件，并传递`e`作为。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . summary.span: 获取或设置此 的几何世界变换的副本。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric world transformation for this .

value.span: 一个 副本，表示此 的几何世界变换。

span.span: A copy of the that represents the geometric world transformation for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks GDI + 使用三个坐标空间： 世界、 页和设备。GDI+ uses three coordinate spaces: world, page, and device. 用于建模对特定图形世界坐标世界坐标，将传递给.NET Framework 中的方法的坐标。World coordinates are the coordinates used to model a particular graphic world and are the coordinates you pass to methods in the .NET Framework. 页坐标是指由绘图图面，如窗体或控件使用的坐标系统。Page coordinates refer to the coordinate system used by a drawing surface, such as a form or a control. 设备坐标是由进行绘制，如屏幕或打印机的物理设备的坐标。Device coordinates are the coordinates used by the physical device being drawn on, such as a screen or a printer. 属性表示的世界转换，将世界坐标映射到页坐标。The property represents the world transformation, which maps world coordinates to page coordinates. 因为返回的矩阵和通过属性是几何转换的副本，所以不再需要时应释放的矩阵。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建两个点，它们之间绘制一条蓝线。Creates two points and draws a blue line between them. - 设置要转换的量 40 沿 x 方向和 30 沿 y 方向的世界转换。Sets the world transform to translate by amounts 40 in the x direction and 30 in the y direction. - 转换从世界坐标点 () 为页面坐标 ()。Transforms the points from world coordinates () to page coordinates (). - 将世界转换重置为标识。Resets the world transformation to the identity. - 已转换的点之间绘制一条红线。Draws a red line between the transformed points. 结果是一条蓝线和下方它已翻译的红色行。The result is a blue line and a translated red line below it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 源通常是绘图图面右上左下角。The origin is typically the upper-left-hand corner of the drawing surface. 转换操作包括将通过其翻译部分是的矩阵转换矩阵乘以`dx`和`dy`参数。The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters. 此方法通过预先计算转换矩阵变换矩阵应用转换。This method applies the translation by prepending the translation matrix to the transformation matrix. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - Windows 窗体的世界转换矩阵旋转 30.0F 度。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30.0F degrees. - 将图形对象的源移动通过调用，预置到转换矩阵的转换。Moves the origin of the graphics object by calling , prepending the translation to the transformation matrix. - 使用蓝色笔绘制平移、 旋转椭圆。Draws a translated, rotated ellipse with a blue pen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CPP/form1.cpp#167)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/CS/form1.cs#167)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3#167](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples3/VB/form1.vb#167)] 下图显示运行上一代码示例的输出。The following illustration shows the output of running the previous code example. ![经过翻译和转换后的 ellipse](~/add/media/ndp-tranlatetransform.png "经过翻译和转换后的椭圆")![Translated and transformed ellipse](~/add/media/ndp-tranlatetransform.png "Translated and transformed ellipse")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换操作包括将通过其翻译部分是的矩阵转换矩阵乘以`dx`和`dy`参数。The translation operation consists of multiplying the transformation matrix by a matrix whose translation part is the `dx` and `dy` parameters. 此方法前面添加或追加的转换矩阵通过根据转换矩阵`order`参数。This method prepends or appends the transformation matrix of the by the translation matrix according to the `order` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设计为使用 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - Windows 窗体的世界转换矩阵旋转 30.0F 度。Rotates the world transformation matrix of the Windows Form by 30.0F degrees. - 将图形对象的源移动通过调用，追加到的世界转换矩阵的平移。Moves the graphics object's origin by calling , appending the translation to the world transformation matrix. - 使用蓝色笔绘制旋转、 平移的椭圆。Draws a rotated, translated ellipse with a blue pen. summary.span: 获取此 的可见剪辑区域的边框。

span.span: Gets the bounding rectangle of the visible clipping region of this .

value.span: 一个 结构，它表示此 的可见剪辑区域的边框。

span.span: A structure that represents a bounding rectangle for the visible clipping region of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所得矩形的大小的单位由属性。The unit for resulting rectangle is designated by the property. 默认单位为像素。The default unit is pixels. 一个通常与控件相关联，该矩形的原点将相对于该控件的客户端区域。A is typically associated with a control and the origin of the rectangle will be relative to the client area of that control. 可见剪辑区域是这样的剪辑区域的交集和窗口的剪辑区域。The visible clipping region is the intersection of the clipping region of this and the clipping region of the window.
